articles.title: Budget office expects Federal Reserve to cut rates in 2026 - abcnews.go.com
articles.description: The Congressional Budget Office has released new economic projections, expecting the Federal Reserve to cut short-term rates in 2026

articles.title: Johnson & Johnson strikes deal with U.S. government to lower drug prices - CNBC
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson said on Thursday that it has reached an agreement with the U.S. President's administration to cut drug prices for Americans.

articles.title: Asia markets trade mixed ahead of China inflation data; Uniqlo owner shares jump 7% - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets were set to trade higher Friday as investors parse China's inflation data coming out later in the day.

articles.title: GM’s EV Charges Balloon to $7.6 Billion as US Demand Craters - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: General Motors Co. will take another $6 billion in charges tied to production cutbacks in its electric vehicle and battery operations as the financial fallout spreads from the weakening US market for EVs.

articles.title: Merck in talks to buy cancer drugmaker Revolution Medicines for up to $32bn - Financial Times
articles.description: US company is attempting to acquire the maker of a new treatment for pancreatic cancer

articles.title: Why Are Grok and X Still Available in App Stores? - WIRED
articles.description: Elon Musk’s chatbot has been used to generate thousands of sexualized images of adults and apparent minors. Apple and Google have removed other “nudify” apps—but continue to host X and Grok.

articles.title: Google cofounders Sergey Brin and Larry Page moved an LLC out of California ahead of proposed billionaire's tax - Business Insider
articles.description: The LLC moved as California's ultrarich weigh leaving ahead of a proposed tax on billionaires that would take effect retroactively starting January 1.

articles.title: Glencore and Rio Tinto resume talks on mining megadeal - Financial Times
articles.description: Discussions over a tie-up to create world’s largest mining group come as race to secure copper reshapes sector

articles.title: Trump threatens to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes - 6abc Philadelphia
articles.description: President Trump said that he intends to ban large institutional investors from buying additional single-family homes.

articles.title: Capital One Lounge coming to Charlotte Douglas International Airport - Axios
articles.description: The new lounge will be on the mezzanine level of Concourse A, near gates 21–29.

articles.title: Job openings slide to 2nd lowest level in 5 years as hiring remains sluggish - abcnews.go.com
articles.description: U.S. employers posted far fewer jobs in November than the previous month, a sign that employers aren’t yet ramping up hiring even as growth has picked up
